message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $130. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $125, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to compromise at $132.50?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $132.50. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $128, but I'm still a bit far from my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to compromise at $131?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $129, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to compromise at $130.50?
